name: Chaos Emperor Dragon - Envoy of the End
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 1 LIGHT and 1 DARK monster in your Graveyard. You can pay 1000 LP; send all cards in both players hands and on the field to the Graveyard, then, inflict 300 damage to your opponent for each card sent this way.
